import React from "react"; import { minutesToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; function DurationButtons({ session, focusDuration, breakDuration, focusDecreaseHandler, focusIncreaseHandler, decreaseBreakHandler, breakIncreaseHandler, }) { return (
Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(focusDuration)}
Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(breakDuration)}
); } export default DurationButtons
